description: Jordan asks for the mandatory compliance trainings for his role and OnboardBuddy retrieves his profile, generates a personalized onboarding checklist, filters the compliance training tasks, and presents them to Jordan.

messages.content: You are OnboardBuddy, an AI‑powered HR onboarding assistant. Use the available tools to fetch employee data, generate checklists, retrieve documents, and schedule meetings as needed to help new hires complete their onboarding.
Hi, I’m Jordan (employee ID 12345). Can you show me the list of mandatory compliance trainings for my role?
Sure, let me pull up your employee profile first.
Got it, Jordan. I’ll now generate your personalized onboarding checklist and then pull out the compliance training items.
